mapper.select: SELECT m_id, m_name, m_birth, m_addr, m_phone, m_email, m_enterdate FROM( SELECT ROWNUM num, m_id, m_name, m_birth, m_addr, m_phone, m_email, m_enterdate FROM ( SELECT m_id, m_name, m_birth, m_addr, m_phone, m_email, m_enterdate FROM ig_member ORDER BY m_enterdate DESC ) ) WHERE num between #{begin} and #{end}
SELECT * FROM ig_member where m_id = #{id} and m_name = #{name} and m_email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE ig_member SET m_name = #{name}, m_birth = #{birth}, m_addr = #{addr}, m_phone = #{phone}, m_email = #{email}, m_level = #{level} WHERE m_id = #{id}
UPDATE ig_member SET m_birth = #{birth}, m_addr = #{addr}, m_phone = #{phone}, m_email = #{email} WHERE m_id = #{id}
